name: Tab Age Tracker
description: Tracks and analyzes the age of your open tabs to help you reduce clutter and reach Tab Zero

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://*.google-analytics.com 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' https://* data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.google-analytics.com https://tab-age-tracker.replit.app
